title: ☀ Sunny & Top Floor ! ☀ Parking included - Huge master closet
posting_body: The apartment #502 is our 2A floor plan 970 sq.
ft. located on the top floor.
This apartment gets great direct afternoon sun, has a huge master closet, and will have fresh new carpet!
Locale offers luxuriously-appointed and uniquely designed studios, one bedroom apartment homes that provide for an intimate living experience on the quiet edge of an emerging City.
Minutes by foot to downtown Redwood City, the neighborhood welcomes you to locally-owned shops, cafes, and nightlife.
Locale's exceptional location is sure to compliment your on-the-go lifestyle while providing a centrally convenient retreat between work and play.
Discover the luxury, comfort, and convenience of your new apartment home- discover Locale!
New, Modernly Designed 133 Unit Apartment Community.
1 FREE parking space for each home
Gated Underground Parking Garage with 18 Convenient EV Charging Stations
Recycling/ Garbage chutes on every floor
Club Room with Kitchen and Televisions
Convenient Walking Distance to Downtown Redwood City
Free Wi-Fi in all Common Areas
Balcony accessible from living room and bedroom*
Full size front loading washer and dryer in each home
Cats and Dogs Welcome, breed restrictions, no weight limits
Pet rent monthly per pet: $75 for dogs $50 for cats
Office Hours: Monday-Friday 9-6pm for self-guided or guided tours
